typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Name as string,
		Parent_Processor_Group as string,
		Running as short,
		Stopped as short,
		Disabled as short,
		Invalid as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 filter(Parent_Processor_Group == 'Appdataingest') ~> Filter1
Filter1 split(toInteger('Stopped') > 0,
	Disabled > 0,
	Running > 0,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Stopped_Processors, Disabled_Processors, Running Processors)
ConditionalSplit1@Stopped_Processors sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
ConditionalSplit1@Disabled_Processors sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
ConditionalSplit1@Running Processors sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink3
